front.title: Domain-Based Application Service Location Using SRV RRs and the Dynamic Delegation Discovery Service (DDDS)
front.abstract: This memo defines a generalized mechanism for application service naming that allows service location without relying on rigid domain naming conventions (so-called name hacks). The proposal defines a Dynamic Delegation Discovery System (DDDS) Application to map domain name, application service name, and application protocol dynamically to target server and port.
